channel.title: Aida's iX Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Aida's iX Blog

item.title: The Art of Buying Art
item.description: Background Those who know me well know that on any given weekend, I’m probably at the museum. I usually come in as a visitor, but ever since I started working at the Hammer Museum last year, I’ve also become a part-time tour guide and researcher. Art history provides a unique and fascinating way to examine the past and historicize the present, allowing us to ask questions like: what sorts of things matter to us?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Aida, a UCLA student with a burgeoning interest in data science. When I’m not plopped in front of R Studio, you can find me in cafes, bookstores, and museums.
